text: Vrh () is a small remote settlement on the Rute Plateau () in the hills south of Rob in central Slovenia. The entire Municipality of Velike Lašče is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Velike Lašče municipal site ==References== ==External links== * *Vrh on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Vrh, Velike Lašče
